name: b0calc
author: FMRIB Analysis Group, University of Oxford

inputs.description: Filename of input image (usually a tissue/air segmentation)
inputs.name: Input file

inputs.description: Value for zeroth-order x-gradient field (per mm); default=0
inputs.name: Zeroth-order x-gradient

inputs.description: Value for zeroth-order y-gradient field (per mm); default=0
inputs.name: Zeroth-order y-gradient

inputs.description: Value for zeroth-order z-gradient field (per mm); default=0
inputs.name: Zeroth-order z-gradient

inputs.description: Value for zeroth-order B0 field (x-component); default=0
inputs.name: Zeroth-order B0 x-component

inputs.description: Value for zeroth-order B0 field (y-component); default=0
inputs.name: Zeroth-order B0 y-component

inputs.description: Value for zeroth-order B0 field (z-component); default=1
inputs.name: Zeroth-order B0 z-component

inputs.description: Value for susceptibility of air; default=+4e-7
inputs.name: Susceptibility of air

inputs.description: Calculate and save all 3 field components (i.e. x,y,z)
inputs.name: XYZ field components flag

inputs.description: Relative proportion to extend voxels at boundary; default=1
inputs.name: Boundary extension proportion

inputs.description: Use direct (image space) convolution, not FFT
inputs.name: Direct convolution flag

output-files.description: B0 x-component output volume (if --xyz is specified)
output-files.name: B0 Output X component

output-files.description: B0 y-component output volume (if --xyz is specified)
output-files.name: B0 Output Y component

output-files.description: B0 z-component output volume (if --xyz is specified)
output-files.name: B0 Output Z component
